testcase.name: Test Case 1 – User should view dashboard if authenticated
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user sees dashboard page...............................................passed

testcase.name: Test Case 2 – User should redirect to login page if not authenticated
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters invalid username and invalid password......................passed Then user sees login page header............................................passed

testcase.name: Test Case 3 – User should view list of events if any event created otherwise user should view
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user views "No registered event has been found!!" notification message.passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user fills "Happy New Year" "Good Bye 2022 Celebration" and Event Date fields.passed Then user fills participants informations for 3 participants and click the Create New Event button.passed And user redirect to dashboard and views event list.........................passed

testcase.name: Test Case 4 – User should be able navigate edit event when click the edit event button
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user fills "Happy New Year" "Good Bye 2022 Celebration" and Event Date fields.passed Then user fills participants informations for 3 participants and click the Create New Event button.passed And user redirect to dashboard and views event list.........................passed Then user clicks edit event button and views edit event header..............passed

testcase.name: Test Case 5 – User should be able to delete event when click the delete button
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user fills "Happy New Year" "Good Bye 2022 Celebration" and Event Date fields.passed Then user fills participants informations for 3 participants and click the Create New Event button.passed And user redirect to dashboard and views event list.........................passed Then user clicks the delete button to delete event..........................passed And user views "No registered event has been found!!" notification message..passed

testcase.name: Test Case 6 – User should be able to view event participants
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user fills "Happy New Year" "Good Bye 2022 Celebration" and Event Date fields.passed Then user fills participants informations for 3 participants and click the Create New Event button.passed And user redirect to dashboard and views event list.........................passed Then user clicks participants button and sees event participants table......passed

testcase.name: Test Case 1 - User should view create event form if
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed

testcase.name: Test Case 2 - User should view validation errors
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user clicks the Create event button without fill the event form.........passed Then user sees validation errors messages on the create event page..........passed

testcase.name: Test Case 3 - User should be able to add new participant
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user clicks the Add Participant button and sees new participant row.....passed

testcase.name: Test Case 4 - User should view error message if removes all participants
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user clicks the Add Participant button and sees new participant row.....passed Then user removes all participants and views "Please add participant!" message.passed

testcase.name: Test Case 5 - User should be able to create new event if fills all required fields
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user fills "Welcome 2023" "New Year Celebration" and Event Date fields..passed Then user fills participants informations for 10 participants and click the Create New Event button.passed Then user should be able to redirect to dashboard page and sees "Event created successfully" message.passed

testcase.name: Test Case 6 - User should be able to edit event. When user click
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user fills "Welcome 2023" "New Year Celebration" and Event Date fields..passed Then user fills participants informations for 5 participants and click the Create New Event button.passed And user clicks edit event button...........................................passed Then user checks "Welcome 2023" "New Year Celebration" "31/12/2022" and participants whether according to editing event.passed

testcase.name: Test Case 7 – User should be able to update event if required fields filled
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to url......................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password..........................passed Then user clicks create event button and sees create event form.............passed And user fills "Welcome 2023" "New Year Celebration" and Event Date fields..passed Then user fills participants informations for 4 participants and click the Create New Event button.passed And user clicks edit event button...........................................passed Then user updates "Happy New Year Celebration" and delete the third(3) participant and add a new participant.passed And user clicks update event button and redirect to dashboard page and sees "Event updated successfully" message.passed
